actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Scaling SET
		Date = '{{update_form.fieldState.Date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Date : update_form.sourceData.Date}}',
		Docket = '{{update_form.fieldState.Docket.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Docket : update_form.sourceData.Docket}}',
    Grade = '{{update_form.fieldState.Grade.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Grade : update_form.sourceData.Grade}}',
		Length = '{{update_form.fieldState.Length.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Length : update_form.sourceData.Length}}',
		Diameter = '{{update_form.fieldState.Diameter.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Diameter : update_form.sourceData.Diameter}}',
		JAS = '{{update_form.fieldState.JAS.isVisible ? update_form.formData.JAS : update_form.sourceData.JAS}}',
		Location = '{{update_form.fieldState.Location.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Location : update_form.sourceData.Location}}'
WHERE Log = {{data_table.selectedRow.Log}};
